name.jp: レインボーフラッシュバン

description.en: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.ar: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.br: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.cns: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.de: Blendet den Spieler, der hinter dir steht, nach Punkten, verdeckt seinen Bildschirm und verlangsamt ihn fünf Sekunden lang um 20 %.
description.fi: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.fil: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.fr: Aveugle le joueur derrière vous en points, couvrant son écran et le ralentissant de 20% pendant 5 secondes.
description.id: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.it: Flashbang the player behind you in points, covering their screen and slowing them down by 20% for 5 seconds.
description.jp: 後ろのプレイヤーをポイントでフラッシュバンし、画面を覆い5秒間20%遅くします。

description.sp: Golpea con Explosión al jugador detrás de ti en puntos, cubriendo su pantalla y ralentizándolo en un 20% durante 5 segundos.
